author: archyde
title: How to create a bookmark on iPhone or iPad?
text:
2024-01-05 15:30:05
Do you like a particular web page? Here’s how to access it very quickly on iPhone or iPad.
This will also interest you
On both the iPhone and the iPad, it is possible to create a bookmark, or shortcut, to a web page. This bookmark will be placed on the home screen and it will therefore be possible to access the page in question directly. Here are the steps to follow.
Load webpage from Safari
It is first necessary to load the desired web page from the Safari browser.
Share page
Click on the “Share” icon. A menu appears on the screen. Scroll through the options until you see “On Home Screen”. Select it. You can change the shortcut text if you want. Finally, select “Add”.
Testing the shortcut
The web page icon appears on the home page and as you can see it is a custom icon. All that remains is to test that this bookmark (shortcut) works as expected.
You can also move the bookmark to the desired panel on the Home screen by holding your finger on the corresponding icon until “–” appears, then moving it to the desired panel.
